channel.title: Npc drops [pi]
channel.description: Okay well I'm making a mini-game and I need to have the npc's drop certain items. And I'm like 95% sure I need to go into npcdrops.tsm but there is only certain npc's in there. Do I just add the npc's, and how can I be sure it is the right npc needed. For example in the npcdrops.tsm there is already a #skeleton with the list of drops but in npc.cfg there is like 7 different skeletons. Any help you can give would be helpful.

item.title: Npc drops [pi]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Npchandler.java under dropitems if you it to go straight to there inv otherwise I would follow this tutorial I didn’t read over it but I think it works… http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/381186-pi-how-add-drops-sanity-system-only-spoon-feed.html

Read full topic

item.title: Npc drops [pi]
item.dc:creator: @alltimenewb alltimenewb
item.description:
@alltimenewb wrote:

Okay well I’m making a mini-game and I need to have the npc’s drop certain items. And I’m like 95% sure I need to go into npcdrops.tsm but there is only certain npc’s in there. Do I just add the npc’s, and how can I be sure it is the right npc needed. For example in the npcdrops.tsm there is already a #skeleton with the list of drops but in npc.cfg there is like 7 different skeletons. Any help you can give would be helpful.

Read full topic
